name: test_e2e_with_logs[223_CMD_FILE_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_FILE_002` |
| **Name** | SSH key exfiltration |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | file_manipulation |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `&& cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa`
- **Encoded**: `%26%26%20cat%20~%2F.ssh%2Fid_rsa`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~18000ms
- **Timestamp**: 09:42:18.000 UTC
